checkbox.label: A3
checkbox.title: Which of the following brands do you think match each of the statements below? You may think that a brand can be described by more than one statement or that each statement can be used to describe more than one brand.
checkbox.row: Is unique
Is a brand that does its own thing
Is confident
Is a brand people talk about
I'm familiar with this brand
Is for someone like me
Takes a stand on socially meaningful topics (e.g. BLM)
Is relevant to me and my peers
Shares the same values and beliefs as I do
Stands for causes or issues I care about
Is an ethical or sustainable brand
Has strong values
Stands up for the values it communicates
Plays a significant role in social good
Is "hot" among my friends and peers
Cares about my community and is engaged in it
Inspires to try new things
Empowers me and my lifestyle
My family/peers and friends buy this brand
Puts community first
Is a brand I love
Meets my needs
"Gets" me and my peers
Makes an impact on the society
Brings people together
Gives us experiences/memories to share
Gets people talking
Is easy and rewarding to purchase
Has a great loyalty program
Is a place I have fond memories of
Is a place that reminds me of a good time in my life
Is a place I used to go with my family
Is easy to place an order
Has easy to use app
None of these match this brand
